basic_info.description: I'm B Dhana Aswini, a MERN Stack and Frontend Developer who loves coding and turning ideas into powerful, user-centric web applications. Whether itâ€™s crafting smooth frontend experiences or architecting scalable backend solutions, I enjoy solving problems through code and continuously learning. Iâ€™m currently looking for full-time opportunities to grow as a developer and make meaningful contributions to impactful projects.

projects.title: LMS Protal
projects.description: A responsive learning management platform featuring separate dashboards for educators and learners. Built with React.js and Tailwind CSS, it allows instructors to upload/manage courses and learners to explore, purchase, and access course content with ease.

projects.title: HostelXpert
projects.description: A smart hostel management system built to streamline room allocation, student tracking, and admin operations. Designed intuitive user interfaces using Nextjs and handled backend tasks with Node.js and MongoDB, making day-to-day hostel management efficient and digital-first.

projects.title: Github Profile Analayzer
projects.description: A web app that fetches and visualizes GitHub user data using the GitHub API. Built with React.js and Chart.js, it displays insights like top languages, repo activity, and commit history in an interactive and user-friendly dashboard.

projects.title: ZenPathways
projects.description: A wellness-focused platform offering access to certified therapists, guided journaling, and calming music. Built using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, the app promotes mental well-being through a clean, intuitive interface and personalized user experience.

projects.title: Memory Game
projects.description: A fun and interactive card-matching game built with React.js, designed to test and improve memory skills. Features smooth animations, randomized card layouts, and responsive gameplay.
